channel.title: Inferno Adze reqs

item.title: Inferno Adze reqs
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

/** * Sets Inferno Adze requirement */ public void PICK_AXESreq() { if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == PICK_AXES[7]) { if (c.playerFiremaking < 92) { /* firemaking level requirement*/ } else { c.sendMessage("You need at least 92 firemaking to use this."); return; } } } }

Thanks vain time to test now will reply back had to fix some errors but got them worked out.

Worked perfectly Vain thank you so very much!

Read full topic

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

sorry should had been specific

this is a pi 317 , base is hybrid pvp

this was put into the mining.java section under players/skills/mining

adding FIRE_SPEC would only be one step I think. As above it says that there is a PICK_AXES and PICK_SPECS these two kind of go together so I didn’t know if there was anything I could put under like the private int or what. Like, the FIRE_SPEC would work probably but it would need a c.setReq or something?

I am totally lost on what to do myself -/

item.title: Inferno Adze reqs
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

-PI 317
-Base is hybrid pvp

[code]/**
* Int[] representing the pick axe ID’S.
*/
private final int[] PICK_AXES = {1265, 1267, 1269, 1273, 1271, 1275, 15259, 13661};

/**
 * Int[] representing the specification to equip the axe.
 */
private final int[] PICK_SPECS = {1, 1, 6, 21, 31, 41, 61};[/code]

::item 13661 is inferno adze and I have the specs for every pickaxe. My question is how do I add the 41 mining requirement AND the 92 firemaking requirement to this. ?

Read full topic
